pageTitle: BoxHero - The Simplest Inventory Management Solution
pageDescription: Stay on top of inventory management in real-time on your computer or mobile device.
topDesc:
Easy, fast, convenient on mobile and PC
BoxHero is all you need for inventory
management.
keyFeature1Desc:
Upload easily with registering only the necessary data.
Rely on BoxHero's helpful category recommendation.
keyFeature1DescMobile:
Upload easily with registering only the necessary data.
Rely on BoxHero's helpful category recommendation.

Conveniently upload your inventory Excel to
BoxHero
keyFeature1SubTitleMobile: Conveniently upload your inventory Excel to BoxHero
keyFeature1SubDesc:
BoxHero provides Excel import for faster product
registration.
keyFeature1SubDescMobile: BoxHero provides Excel import for faster product registration.
keyFeature2Desc:
Select product, insert quantity, and done!
Smartphone barcode scanner will save you time
inventorying.
keyFeature2DescMobile:
Select product, insert quantity, and done!
Smartphone barcode scanner will save you time inventorying.
keyFeature2SubDesc:
BoxHero supports barcode customization to suit your
needs.
keyFeature2SubDescMobile: BoxHero supports barcode customization to suit your needs.
keyFeature3Desc:
Inventorying is so much easier with the Product List.
View only the data you need at a glance.
keyFeature3SubDesc: BoxHero provides various inventory analyses like turnover rate, profit, and more.
keyFeature3SubDescMobile: BoxHero's easy, straightforward dashboard to know more about your inventory.
